buildCommand: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && . $HOME/.cargo/env && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && curl https://rustwasm.github.io/wasm-pack/installer/init.sh -sSf | sh && wasm-pack build --target web && mkdir -p public/pkg && cp -r pkg/* public/pkg/
